name: Alien Aftermath
description:
A small proof of concept for a roguelike deck builder set in space! Once you have used all your cards, the game is over. Use them wisely!

Please run the game at 1920 x 1080 and keep in mind that there are plenty of bugs! Just wanted to get something developed quickly. 

The entire development of the game happened in less than a week. 

Art assets not my own! Obtained them from: https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite
